game_description: Use your own living room to solve the crime! Using passthrough, the crime scene is overlaid onto your play area, leaving you free to explore and find clues. Use the patent-pending Residual Heat Scanner to detect the criminals' recent movements, and then dust for fingerprints or try to find evidence left behind. With your wits, and your trusty sidekick Steve Dobbins' snarky comments, you're sure to get to the bottom of these confusing crimes.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Spanish (Spain), Ukrainian

review_3: Very cool concept but it needs alot more work. first off it needs alot of play area,roughly 10x10. 2nd the items that it spawns tend to be too close to the boundary especially the floor so i had to raise that boundary up a couple clicks off the actual floor to get around that. 3rd the gadgets are very difficult to grab. 4th theres too much uninterruptable talking! 5th once you have played a level, theres simply no Replayability. If not this game will suffer..
